content: handmade crochet charms are one of the quick and easy projects that are fun to make they make wonderful accessories and embellishments they are great to adorn your bags handbags bottles keyrings or wallets crochet charms are the best to add a personal touch to you belongings with valentines day just around the corner here is super cute pattern to celebrate the month of love today am sharing the pattern for a quick crochet heart charm the pattern is really super easy and super quick with just two simple rounds these adorable crochet heart charms are the perfect thing to make for valentine s day gifts and decorations you can use them as gift toppers too they will really look cute materials used - worsted weight yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 3 5 inches - customizable to any size checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/mngewmur6v0
